name: reverberation
content:
reverberation noun
(SOUND)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C usually plural, U ] literary a sound that lasts for a long time and makes things seem to shake: She felt the reverberation(s) in her chest and cursed the drilling outside.
SMART Vocabulary: related words and phrases
Shaking, swinging and vibrating
brandish
earth-shaking
flap
flappy
flourish

fluff something up
ripple
rock-a-bye
shake out
shakily
shakiness
shimmy
sway
thrash
vibrate
vibration
vibratory
waggle
wiggle
See more results »
reverberation noun
(EFFECTS)
reverberations [ plural ]
effects that spread and affect a lot of people: have reverberations This move is likely to have reverberations throughout the health service.
